Text.Page:
Protecting researchers is like herding hyperactive drunk cats. They don't listen, they go off on their own, and only when they get bloodied do they come whimpering back.

I've got everyone here, for now. If you could thin out the ranks of {@LinkCreature:7#10#lean hyenas}, that would make our trips a lot safer.
I almost feel bad for the hyenas. Almost. The researchers will be a lot safer now, thanks to you. I know they don't say it very often, but your help is appreciated.
